item.title: 15 Years and 5K
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Zeldman recalls the original Much Ado About 5K, in 15 Years Ago in ALA: Much Ado About 5K: what goes around (performance) comes around (performance). … you could no longer give high design marks to a site (however innovative, however visually arresting) if it took forever to load over constrained mobile networks. Because performance was […]
item.content:encoded:
Zeldman recalls the original Much Ado About 5K, in 15 Years Ago in ALA: Much Ado About 5K:

what goes around (performance) comes around (performance).
…
you could no longer give high design marks to a site (however innovative, however visually arresting) if it took forever to load over constrained mobile networks. Because performance was part of design, and always had been.
